name: com.coffee.upm-git-extension
description:
This plugin extends the UI of Unity Package Manager for the packages installed with git.

 - Support GitHub, Bitbucket and GitLab
 - Add link to the repogitory
 - link to the online documents
 - Update the package with a specific tag/branch
 - Remove the package
author: mob-sakai <sakai861104@gmail.com> (https://github.com/mob-sakai)
